header: God Commands Hosea to Start a Family

verse: The word of Yahweh that came to Hosea son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, the kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash, king of Israel.
And she conceived again and bore a daughter, and he said to him,
